Author: John Novak <john@johnnovak.net>
Returns an ordered table of regions where the key is the region ID.

Imports

endians, strformat, tables

Types

WaveFormat = enum
  wf8BitInteger = (0, "8-bit integer"), wf16BitInteger = (1, "16-bit integer"),
  wf24BitInteger = (2, "24-bit integer"), wf32BitInteger = (3, "32-bit integer"),
  wf32BitFloat = (4, "32-bit IEEE float"), wf64BitFloat = (5, "64-bit IEEE float")
supported WAVE formats (bit-depths) 
WaveChunkInfo = object
  id*: string                  ## 4-char chunk ID (FourCC)
  size*: uint32                ## size of chunk data in bytes
  filePos*: int64              ## file position of the chunk
contains information about a chunk 
WaveRegion = object
  startFrame*: uint32          ## start sample frame of the marker/region
  length*: uint32              ## length of the region in frames (0 for markers)
  label*: string               ## text label
represents a marker (if length is 0) or a region 
WaveReader = object
  filename: string
  file: File
  endianness: Endianness
  format: WaveFormat
  sampleRate: Natural
  numChannels: Natural
  chunks: seq[WaveChunkInfo]
  regions: OrderedTable[uint32, WaveRegion]
  readBuffer: seq[uint8]
  riffChunkSize: uint32
  nextChunkPos: int64
  swapEndian: bool

WaveReaderError = object of Exception
WaveWriter = object
  filename: string
  endianness: Endianness
  format: WaveFormat
  sampleRate: Natural
  numChannels: Natural
  regions: OrderedTable[uint32, WaveRegion]
  file: File
  writeBuffer: seq[uint8]
  chunkSize: seq[int64]
  chunkSizePos: seq[int64]
  trackChunkSize: bool
  swapEndian: bool

WaveWriterError = object of Exception

Consts

FOURCC_RIFF_LE = "RIFF"
RIFF ID (little endian) 
FOURCC_RIFF_BE = "RIFX"
RIFF ID (big endian) 
FOURCC_WAVE = "WAVE"
WAVE format ID 
FOURCC_FORMAT = "fmt "
Format chunk ID 
FOURCC_DATA = "data"
Data chunk ID 
FOURCC_CUE = "cue "
Cue chunk ID 
FOURCC_LIST = "LIST"
List chunk ID 
FOURCC_ASSOC_DATA = "adtl"
Associated data list chunk ID 
FOURCC_LABEL = "labl"
Label chunk ID 
FOURCC_LABELED_TEXT = "ltxt"
Labeled text chunk ID 
FOURCC_REGION = "rgn "
Region chunk ID

proc filename(wr: WaveReader): string {.
inline, raises: [], tags: []
.}
The filename of the WAVE file. 
proc file(wr: WaveReader): File {.
inline, raises: [], tags: []
.}
The file object to used to read the WAVE file data. 
proc endianness(wr: WaveReader): Endianness {.
inline, raises: [], tags: []
.}
The endianness of the WAVE file. 
proc format(wr: WaveReader): WaveFormat {.
inline, raises: [], tags: []
.}
The format (bit-depth) of the audio data (populated by parseWaveFile and readFormatChunk). 
proc sampleRate(wr: WaveReader): Natural {.
inline, raises: [], tags: []
.}
The sample rate of audio data (populated by parseWaveFile and readFormatChunk). 
proc numChannels(wr: WaveReader): Natural {.
inline, raises: [], tags: []
.}
The number of channels stored in the audio data (populated by parseWaveFile and readFormatChunk). 
proc chunks(wr: WaveReader): seq[WaveChunkInfo] {.
inline, raises: [], tags: []
.}
A list containing info about the chunks found in the WAVE file (populated by parseWaveFile and buildChunkList). 
proc regions(wr: WaveReader): OrderedTable[uint32, WaveRegion] {.
inline, raises: [],
    tags: []
.}
proc readFourCC(wr: WaveReader): string {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                      tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a 4-byte FourCC as a string from the current file position. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readInt8(wr: WaveReader): int8 {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                  tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a single int8 value from the current file position. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readInt16(wr: WaveReader): int16 {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                    tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a single int16 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readInt32(wr: WaveReader): int32 {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                    tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a single int32 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readInt64(wr: WaveReader): int64 {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                    tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a single int64 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors.

raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                    tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a single uint8 value from the current file position. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors.

raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                      tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}

raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],

raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                      tags: [ReadIOEffect]

Reads a single uint64 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readFloat32(wr: WaveReader): float32 {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                        tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a single float32 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readFloat64(wr: WaveReader): float64 {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError],
                                        tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads a single float64 value from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readData(wr: var WaveReader; dest: var openArray[int8 | uint8]; len: Natural)
Reads len number of int8|uint8 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readData(wr: var WaveReader; dest: var openArray[int16 | uint16]; len: Natural)
Reads len number of int16|uint16 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readData(wr: var WaveReader; dest: var openArray[int32 | uint32 | float32];
             len: Natural)
Reads len number of int32|uint32|float32 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readData(wr: var WaveReader; dest: var openArray[int64 | uint64 | float64];
             len: Natural)
Reads len number of int64|uint64|float64 values into dest from the current file position and performs endianness conversion if necessary. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc readData(wr: var WaveReader; data: var openArray[int8 | uint8])
Shortcut to fill the whole data buffer with data. 
proc readData(wr: var WaveReader; data: var openArray[
    int16 | uint16 | int32 | uint32 | int64 | uint64 | float32 | float64])
Shortcut to fill the whole data buffer with data. 
proc hasNextChunk(wr: var WaveReader): bool {.
raises: [], tags: []
.}
Returns true iff the wave file has more chunks (to be used with nextChunk). 
proc nextChunk(wr: var WaveReader): WaveChunkInfo {.

    raises: [WaveReaderError, IOError], tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Finds the next chunk in the file; raises a WaveReadError if the end of file has been reached. Returns chunk info and sets the file pointer to the start of the chunk if successful. 
proc readFormatChunk(wr: var WaveReader) {.
raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError,
    ValueError], tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Reads the format chunk from the current file position and sets the format info in the WaveReader object on success. Raises a WaveReaderError on any error (e.g. read error, chunk not found, unsupported format etc.). 
proc readRegionIdsAndStartOffsetsFromCueChunk(wr: var WaveReader;
    regions: var OrderedTable[uint32, WaveRegion]) {.

    raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError, KeyError], tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
proc readRegionLabelsAndEndOffsetsFromListChunk(wr: var WaveReader;
    regions: var OrderedTable[uint32, WaveRegion]) {.

    raises: [IOError, WaveReaderError, KeyError], tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
proc openWaveFile(filename: string; bufSize: Natural = 4096): WaveReader {.

    raises: [WaveReaderError, IOError], tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Opens a WAVE file for reading but does not parse anything else than the master RIFF header. Raises a WaveReaderError if the file is not a valid WAVE file and on read errors. 
proc buildChunkList(wr: var WaveReader) {.
raises: [WaveReaderError, IOError, ValueError],
                                      tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Finds all top-level chunks in the WAVE file and stores the result as a list of ChunkInfo objects that can be accessed through the chunks property. Raises a WaveReadError on read errors. 
proc parseWaveFile(filename: string; readRegions: bool = false; bufSize: Natural = 4096): WaveReader {.

    raises: [WaveReaderError, IOError, ValueError, KeyError], tags: [ReadIOEffect]
.}
Opens a WAVE file for reading, builds the chunk list, reads the format chunk, reads the markers and regions if readRegions is true, then seeks to the start of the data chunk. Raises a WaveReaderError if the file is not a valid WAVE file and on read errors.
